New Records: Max Muncy extended his streak of reaching base safely to 12 plate appearances, a postseason record
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a leadoff homer and scored four times
Mookie Betts had a two-run homer and a two-run double among his four hits
Mark Vientos provided a rare highlight for New York, hitting his fourth postseason homer in the first inning
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Dave Roberts emphasized the importance of not giving the Mets any momentum
Manager Carlos Mendoza anticipated David Peterson making a regular start
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Roberts expressed excitement about being in the position to win five more games
Brandon Nimmo mentioned that if the Mets come back from the deficit, it would be a 'heck of a story'

The Mets have been outscored 30-9 in the series, including 9-0 in the opener and 8-0 in Game 3
